qa.answer: Depends on maintainer's schedule. Check lastUpdated field in JSON files for most recent update date.

qa.question: Can I contribute Q&A content?
qa.answer: Yes! Submit questions and answers to developer via pull requests or issues. Follow existing JSON format.

qa.question: What makes a good question?
qa.answer: Specific, clear, uses proper terminology, one concept per question, right subject selected, correct spelling.

qa.question: What makes a good answer?
qa.answer: Accurate, concise, well-explained, includes examples when helpful, addresses question directly, easy to understand.

qa.question: Can I export as HTML?
qa.answer: Not built-in. Could modify export function to generate formatted HTML with styles for browser viewing.

qa.question: How do I export to Notion?
qa.answer: Export as TXT or MD, then copy-paste into Notion, or use Notion's import feature for markdown files.

qa.question: Can I export to database?
qa.answer: Not directly. Export as JSON (modify code), then import JSON into database using migration script.

qa.question: What's the export file naming convention?
qa.answer: Default: navi_ai_export_[username]_[timestamp].txt. Customize in exportAsText() function if needed.

qa.question: Can I include metadata in exports?
qa.answer: Yes, exports include username, email, timestamp. Modify function to add more metadata like subject distribution.

qa.question: How do I export for printing?
qa.answer: Use Export PDF button, or export TXT and format in word processor before printing.

qa.question: Can I email exports directly?
qa.answer: Not built-in. Export file first, then attach to email manually. Could integrate email API for direct sending.

qa.question: What if import file has encoding issues?
qa.answer: Ensure file is UTF-8 encoded. Open in text editor, save as UTF-8, then try importing again.

qa.question: Can I import from clipboard?
qa.answer: Not built-in. Could add feature to paste conversation text directly instead of file upload.

qa.question: How do I validate export format before import?
qa.answer: Check for 'YOU:' and 'NAVI AI:' prefixes. Verify proper line breaks. Test import on copy first.

qa.question: Can I use hardware security module?
qa.answer: Overkill for client-side app. If needed, implement server backend with HSM for key storage and encryption.

qa.question: What's the threat model?
qa.answer: Protects against casual localStorage browsing. Not secure against determined attacker with device access or decompiling code.

qa.question: Can I add security audit logging?
qa.answer: Yes, add timestamps for all operations (login, logout, export, clear) and store in separate localStorage key.

qa.question: What if localStorage is disabled?
qa.answer: Navi AI won't work without localStorage. Display error message and instructions to enable it.

qa.question: Can I use IndexedDB instead of localStorage?
qa.answer: Yes, refactor storage layer to use IndexedDB. Provides more storage space and better performance for large data.
Use DOMPurify or similar library to sanitize user input before storing. Prevent XSS attacks.

qa.question: Can I add content security policy?
qa.answer: Yes, add CSP headers to prevent inline scripts, limit resource loading. Important for security hardening.

qa.question: What about SQL injection?
qa.answer: Not applicable - no SQL database. All data in localStorage as JSON. Still validate/sanitize all inputs.

qa.question: Can I implement zero-knowledge architecture?
qa.answer: Yes, encrypt data with user-provided password never stored. Only encrypted data in localStorage.

qa.question: How do I handle GDPR right to erasure?
qa.answer: Clear button deletes all data. For complete erasure, run localStorage.clear() and confirm data removal.

qa.question: DevTools console shows warnings
qa.answer: Warnings usually non-critical. Check specific warning message. May be browser-specific or extension-related.

qa.question: Memory leak over long usage
qa.answer: Export and clear history periodically. Close and reopen tab. Check browser task manager for memory usage.

qa.question: Slow performance on mobile
qa.answer: Clear history, close other apps, use lighter browser. Mobile has limited resources compared to desktop.

qa.question: Theme colors look different on mobile
qa.answer: Different screens have different color profiles. Adjust device brightness/color settings for consistency.

qa.question: Touch gestures don't work
qa.answer: Ensure touch events enabled in code. Update to latest browser. Some gestures may not be implemented.

qa.question: Auto-complete interferes with typing
qa.answer: Disable browser auto-complete in input settings. Add autocomplete='off' to input elements in HTML.

qa.question: Text-to-speech not working
qa.answer: Navi AI doesn't include TTS by default. If you added it, check browser TTS API support and permissions.

qa.question: Notifications not showing
qa.answer: If you added notifications, check browser notification permissions. May be blocked in settings.

qa.question: Service worker not caching
qa.answer: If you added PWA, check service worker registration. HTTPS required for service workers.

qa.question: App not installable as PWA
qa.answer: Verify manifest.json exists, icons are correct sizes, HTTPS enabled, service worker registered.

qa.question: How do I implement real-time collaboration?
qa.answer: Add WebSocket server, sync messages across clients, handle conflicts, implement operational transformation or CRDT.

qa.question: Can I add video chat integration?
qa.answer: Yes, integrate WebRTC for peer-to-peer video, or use services like Agora, Twilio Video.

qa.question: How do I implement smart suggestions?
qa.answer: Analyze past questions, identify patterns, use ML to predict relevant questions, show as chips/buttons.

qa.question: Can I add sentiment analysis?
qa.answer: Yes, use libraries like sentiment.js or cloud APIs to analyze emotional tone of questions/answers.

qa.question: How do I implement semantic search?
qa.answer: Use embeddings (word2vec, BERT), calculate semantic similarity, rank results by meaning not just keywords.

qa.question: Can I add entity extraction?
qa.answer: Yes, use NER (Named Entity Recognition) libraries to extract people, places, dates from conversations.

qa.question: How do I implement topic modeling?
qa.answer: Use LDA or NMF algorithms to automatically discover topics from conversation history.

qa.question: Can I add conversation summaries?
qa.answer: Yes, implement extractive or abstractive summarization to create concise summaries of long chats.

qa.question: How do I implement question rewording?
qa.answer: Use paraphrase detection, synonym replacement, or ML models to automatically improve question phrasing.

qa.question: Can I add knowledge graph?
qa.answer: Yes, structure Q&A as graph with entities as nodes, relationships as edges. Query using graph traversal.

qa.question: How do I implement context awareness?
qa.answer: Store conversation context, reference previous messages, maintain topic thread across multiple questions.

qa.question: Can I add voice commands?
qa.answer: Yes, use Web Speech API's recognition for voice input, parse commands, execute actions.

qa.question: How do I implement smart notifications?
qa.answer: Track user patterns, send reminders at optimal times, notify about relevant new Q&A content.

qa.question: Can I add predictive typing?
qa.answer: Yes, analyze past questions, build n-gram model, suggest completions as user types.

qa.question: How do I implement question clustering?
qa.answer: Use k-means or hierarchical clustering on question embeddings to group similar questions.

qa.question: How do I use Navi AI for project planning?
qa.answer: Ask about methodologies, best practices, technical requirements. Export discussions for project documentation.

qa.question: Can I use it for meeting notes?
qa.answer: Ask questions during meetings, capture key points as conversations, export as meeting minutes.

qa.question: How do I use it for troubleshooting?
qa.answer: Describe issues as questions, work through solutions systematically, document successful fixes.

qa.question: Can I use it for writing assistance?
qa.answer: Ask about grammar, writing techniques, structure. Use English subject for language help.

qa.question: How do I make it my default reference?
qa.answer: Set as browser homepage, add bookmark toolbar button, make keyboard shortcut, pin tab permanently.
